pkgmetadata.longdescription: owl2else=========Scripts to transform ontology OWL 2 files to other languages - owl2clips transforms OWL 2 ontologies to COOL CLIPS language - owl2plot transforms OWL 2 ontologies to a plot using graphviz - owl2rdflib transforms OWL 2 to a python file with a RDFlib ClosedNamespace object with the vocabulary of the ontology
